framework.name: CIS Critical Security Controls
framework.description: Prioritized safeguards to reduce common cyber risks across assets, identities, data, and infrastructure.

domains.name: Inventory
domains.description: Establish and maintain visibility into assets and software.

domains.name: Protect
domains.description: Apply protective safeguards to reduce exposure.

domains.name: Detect
domains.description: Continuously identify malicious or abnormal activity.

domains.name: Respond
domains.description: Respond, recover, and improve after incidents.

controls.title: Inventory of enterprise assets
controls.summary_description: Maintain an accurate inventory of hardware, virtual, and cloud assets.
controls.implementation_guidance: Automate discovery, assign owners, and review inventory changes monthly.

suggested_task_templates.title: Refresh asset inventory
suggested_task_templates.description: Validate newly discovered assets and ownership.

controls.title: Inventory of software assets
controls.summary_description: Track authorized software and remove unauthorized applications.
controls.implementation_guidance: Use allowlists and monitor installations for drift.

suggested_task_templates.title: Audit software inventory
suggested_task_templates.description: Compare installed software to approved list.

controls.title: Data protection
controls.summary_description: Protect data through classification, encryption, and retention.
controls.implementation_guidance: Classify data, apply encryption, and enforce retention schedules.

suggested_task_templates.title: Validate data protection controls
suggested_task_templates.description: Confirm encryption and retention for sensitive data.

controls.title: Secure configuration
controls.summary_description: Harden systems and software against known misconfigurations.
controls.implementation_guidance: Apply configuration baselines and measure drift.

suggested_task_templates.title: Review configuration baseline
suggested_task_templates.description: Validate baseline adherence for critical systems.

controls.title: Account management
controls.summary_description: Manage identities, lifecycle events, and privileged accounts.
controls.implementation_guidance: Implement joiner/mover/leaver controls and review privileged access.

suggested_task_templates.title: Run privileged access review
suggested_task_templates.description: Confirm privileged access aligns with role and need.

controls.title: Access control management
controls.summary_description: Enforce least privilege and segmentation of access.
controls.implementation_guidance: Apply MFA and conditional access for critical systems.

suggested_task_templates.title: Verify MFA coverage
suggested_task_templates.description: Ensure MFA applied to all critical accounts.

controls.title: Continuous vulnerability management
controls.implementation_guidance: Run regular scans and track remediation SLAs.

suggested_task_templates.title: Weekly vulnerability review
suggested_task_templates.description: Review critical findings and assign remediation.

controls.title: Audit log management
controls.summary_description: Collect, protect, and analyze audit logs for key systems.
controls.implementation_guidance: Centralize logs, define retention, and review alerts.

suggested_task_templates.title: Validate log collection
suggested_task_templates.description: Confirm critical systems send logs to central store.

controls.title: Email and web protections
controls.summary_description: Reduce threats via web filtering and email security controls.
controls.implementation_guidance: Enforce anti-phishing, web filtering, and DMARC policies.

controls.title: Malware defenses
controls.summary_description: Prevent, detect, and respond to malware across endpoints.
controls.implementation_guidance: Deploy EDR, keep signatures updated, and isolate compromised devices.

suggested_task_templates.title: Validate EDR coverage
suggested_task_templates.description: Ensure endpoints are reporting to EDR platform.

controls.title: Data recovery
controls.summary_description: Back up critical data and test restoration procedures.
controls.implementation_guidance: Define backup cadence and run restore tests.

suggested_task_templates.title: Run backup restore test
suggested_task_templates.description: Validate recovery procedures for critical systems.

controls.title: Network infrastructure management
controls.summary_description: Maintain secure network configurations and segmentation.
controls.implementation_guidance: Review firewall rules and document network diagrams.

suggested_task_templates.title: Review network segmentation
suggested_task_templates.description: Validate firewall rules and segmentation boundaries.

controls.title: Network monitoring and defense
controls.summary_description: Monitor network traffic for malicious activity.
controls.implementation_guidance: Deploy IDS/IPS and review network alerts.

suggested_task_templates.title: Investigate network alerts
suggested_task_templates.description: Review IDS alerts and remediate anomalies.

controls.title: Security awareness and skills training
controls.summary_description: Train workforce to recognize and respond to threats.
controls.implementation_guidance: Deliver onboarding training and periodic simulations.

suggested_task_templates.title: Run phishing simulation
suggested_task_templates.description: Execute a phishing simulation and document results.

controls.title: Service provider management
controls.summary_description: Assess and manage third-party security posture.
controls.implementation_guidance: Track providers, review contracts, and collect security attestations.

suggested_task_templates.title: Review vendor security posture
suggested_task_templates.description: Collect attestations and assess risk for key vendors.

controls.title: Application software security
controls.summary_description: Embed security into the software development lifecycle.
controls.implementation_guidance: Use secure coding practices, code review, and dependency scanning.

suggested_task_templates.title: Review SDLC controls
suggested_task_templates.description: Validate code review and scanning coverage.

controls.title: Incident response management
controls.summary_description: Coordinate incident response, triage, and post-incident learning.

controls.title: Penetration testing
controls.summary_description: Regularly test defenses through penetration testing or red team exercises.
controls.implementation_guidance: Plan testing scope, track findings, and validate remediation.

suggested_task_templates.title: Schedule penetration test
suggested_task_templates.description: Plan and execute annual penetration test.
